title: Jittery Ping during games
body:
Over the past couple of weeks my ping has been jittering up and down from about 40ms up to 200ms... frequently. 
Before this I would have a constant 28 to the mid 30's ping.
 
I don't understand why this keeps happening - as far as I can tell it is not happening on other games that are online, where I can keep a stable connection. 

**Could anyone help me out with this because it is becoming insanely annoying, especially in ranked games** or any suggestions that could ease the spikes? Tbh the spikes aren't that much of an issue it's just the fact I play with an average of 150ms... 

e.g. I was playing Elise jungle, nice sneak into the bottom shrubs, flash e'd into the face of the ADC not realising I had hit 500ms... Evidently I missed. Incomes spam ping '?'

replies.body:
Big changes in latency like this are often caused by changes in your network routing to League specifically, which is why you don't see it affecting any other games or services. Before we take a look at your network routing we'll need you to confirm your local network settings are compatible with League by having you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if this caused any changes for you.
